oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of Hershel Bell Wilson and Samuel Barnett Wilson
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Oval photograph of Pvt. Hershel Bell Wilson, Co. A, 23rd Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, and his brother Capt. Samuel Barnett Wilson, Co. A, 45th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA. The two brothers, natives of Smith County, Tenn., are pictured in full uniform, standing, and holding hands. Hershel survived the war. Samuel was wounded on July 5, 1864 and died on July 7, 1864 in Atlanta.
